mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.huanbaoshipin_name as huanbaoshipinName ,a.huanbaoshipin_photo as huanbaoshipinPhoto ,a.huanbaoshipin_video as huanbaoshipinVideo ,a.huanbaoshipin_types as huanbaoshipinTypes ,a.huanbaoshipin_content as huanbaoshipinContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM huanbaoshipin a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.huanbaoshipin_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanbaoshipinName},'%')
and a.huanbaoshipin_video like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanbaoshipinVideo},'%')
and a.huanbaoshipin_types = #{params.huanbaoshipinTypes}
and a.huanbaoshipin_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.huanbaoshipinContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
